distanceToLocation.title: distanceToLocation
distanceToLocation.description: This refers to the distance (In miles) from "California" to the distanceToLocation received from "Product Sales Agent" prompt

productName.title: productName
productName.description: This refers productName received from "Product Sales Agent" prompt

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description: This refers to the quantity received from "Product Sales Agent" prompt, set value as 0 if value is not received.

timeDuration.title: timeDuration
timeDuration.description: This refers to the timeDuration received from "Product Sales Agent" prompt
